creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription:
Recto, across bottom of sheet, cursive in pencil: [J. McNeill Whistler Presented to P.J. Hamerton]
Center verso, in pencil: [A26222]
LL verso, in pencil: [202]; cursive in pencil: [Wedmore 69. / Sketching (1862). / Presentation proof from Whistler to Hamerton. / The handwriting on the face is Hamerton's.]
LR verso, in pencil: [36]
signed: Printed signature LR (diagonally) in the plate: [Whistler]
title: Sketching, No. 1
